## Ordre

## Simulation
```{r simulation}
    timer = createTimer(precision = "ms")

    timer$start("syn_cart1")
    syn_cart1 = syn(df, method = "cart")
    timer$stop("syn_cart1")

    timer$start("syn_cart2")
    syn_cart2 = syn(df, method = "cart", visit.sequence = visit_sequence)
    timer$stop("syn_cart2")
```
